title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with Ollama models, similar to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama-cli (rlane/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive terminal UI for Ollama with readline history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-ollama)
summary: Bridge that lets GitHub Copilot/VSC use a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama4j (ollama-java)
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support.

title: ollama-rag (ingest PDFs & chat)
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that answers prompts using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Registry listing 30+ community packages: ollama-agents, ollama-next, ollama-express, etc.

title: ollama-pypi (PyPI search)
summary: PyPI shows official ollama plus 20+ utilities: ollama-rag, ollama-chat, ollama-selenium, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker & docker-compose examples for CPU and GPU setups.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tweaks and integrations around Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama-sharp)
summary: Unofficial C# .NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel DMs to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a command to summarize or continue writing using Ollama.

title: ollama-ray (distributed inference)
summary: Ray example showing how to scale Ollama inference workers across a cluster.
